resources.string: Mode 1\n "Basic mode (cropping, rotating, page sorting, etc.)"
Mode 2 \n "Add image filters (grayscale, auto image enhancement, etc.) to basic mode"
Mode 3\nAdds machine learning image cleanup features (e.g. removing smudges and fingers) to Mode 2.
Mode 3 Description: In this mode, major new features are automatically added through Google Play services updates. The other two modes will keep the current feature set and receive only minor fixes.
